title: Andrey Klimov
text:
Andrey Klimov (born 26 July 1982) is a <a href="Russians">Russian</a> professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who challenged for the <a href="International%20Boxing%20Federation">IBF</a> <a href="super-featherweight">super-featherweight</a> title in 2015.
Professional career.
Klimov won the first 16 fights of his career, before losing a <a href="unanimous%20decision">unanimous decision</a> to <a href="Terence%20Crawford">Terence Crawford</a> on 5 October 2013. On 13 June 2015, he fought <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Pedraza%20%28boxer%29">José Pedraza</a> and lost by unanimous decision.
